text: basa! Jo allaha ta'ala tamane temana ko'i jutha tarapha mokali pacha la'i ave, pachi a loko tamari sathe yud'dhana medanamam avavani paravanagi mange, to tame kahi do ke tame loko mari sathe avi nathi sakata ane na to mari sathe tame satru'o same yud'dha kari sako cho, tame prathama vakhata besi rahevanum pasanda karyum hatum, basa! Tame pachala rahi janara loko manja besi raho
